remarks: Property of a linear functional.  ( ~ lnfnaddi analog.)  (Contributed by NM, 18-Apr-2014.)
statement:
lflsub.d $e |- D = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
lflsub.m $e |- M = ( -g ` D ) $.
lflsub.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lflsub.a $e |- .- = ( -g ` W ) $.
lflsub.f $e |- F = ( LFnl ` W ) $.
lflsub $p |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ G e. F /\ ( X e. V /\ Y e. V ) ) -> ( G ` ( X .- Y ) ) = ( ( G ` X ) M ( G ` Y ) ) ) $.
